reg_pit.acttitle:
Business Practices and Consumer Protection Act
Cremation, Interment and Funeral Services Act
Motion Picture Act
reg_pit.title: Fee Setting Criteria Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 104/2017, effective April 1, 2017.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Fees or charges payable in respect of licence
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 179 of the Business Practices and Consumer Protection Act and section 59 of the Cremation, Interment and Funeral Services Act, the administrative authority must comply with a fee setting process that is in accordance with the following criteria:
